name: Drag Taxi - Try Not To Crash & Die On The Highway
name_original: Drag Taxi - Try Not To Crash & Die On The Highway
description:
- No In App Purchases
- No Micro Transactions
- No internet connection needed to play.
- Touch and Drag. Crazy Game.
- Created by an Indie developer with a heart
- Enjoy

The taxi game of the year is here! How far can you go?! How fast can you go?! Drag on and find out! How long can you go stay in this taxi? Ride this taxi and find out!
